title: Infinity Embedding
description: High-throughput, OpenAI-compatible text embedding & reranker powered by Infinity

input.name: Model Names
input.description: One or more Hugging-Face model IDs. Separate multiple IDs with a semicolon.

input.name: Batch Sizes
input.description: Per-model batch size; semicolon-separated list matching MODEL_NAMES.

input.name: Backend
input.description: Inference engine for all models: torch, optimum, or ctranslate2.

input.name: Data Types
input.description: Precision per model (auto, fp16, fp8). Semicolon-separated, must match MODEL_NAMES.

input.name: Infinity Queue Size
input.description: Max items queueable inside the Infinity engine.

input.name: Max Concurrency
input.description: Max concurrent requests the RunPod wrapper will accept.
